objects.text: Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs

925 Sterling Silver • Perfect Gift for Her
Certificate of Authenticity • 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner features a soft, romantic design centered around an elegant jewelry product. A radiant pink-to-rose radial gradient forms the background, styled with soft circular highlights and subtle ornamental outlines to enhance visual depth. At the top, the main title (`heading`) is prominently displayed in a bold, stylized serif font, followed by a refined subheading (`subheading`) that hints at the product type. The central visual element is the `product_image`, showcasing glimmering wreath-style earrings. Below this image is the `description` text block, listing product features. The price (`price`) stands out in a large, graceful font, and the tagline (`tagline`) adds a sentimental touch. At the bottom, a maroon call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`) invites shoppers to act.

**Color Palette:**
- Rose Gradient: `#FFEEEE` to `#F4C3C3`
- Maroon: `#A13A3A`
- Soft Shadow Pink: `#E8B9B9`
- Pink Tint: `#F9E1E1`
- Text Shades: `#B45E5E`, `#7E3B3B`, `#66302F`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features elegant earrings blending blush pink and sparkling white tones to create a luxurious and feminine aesthetic. The primary color is a soft rose gold (#F4A9A0), which forms the metallic base and outlines of the earrings. This is harmoniously paired with pastel pink (#F8C1BF) in the petal sections, giving a gentle yet eye-catching contrast. The embedded gemstones are a radiant brilliant white (#FFFFFF) with hints of icy silver (#DCE1E3), providing light reflection and shimmering accents. These colors are well-blended yet distinct, highlighting each element. Suggested headline banner palette: #F4A9A0, #F8C1BF, #FFFFFF, and #DCE1E3.
